markdownRemark.html:
Motivation

As a student paying bills and expenses all by myself I wanted to have easy way for writing down all my expenses, so I could see where my money is going and in case of emergency or suspicion - analyze, what the cash flow is.

First Thoughts

First of all, as a programmer I have experience with a lot of backend and frontend frameworks, such as Node.js, Express, React, Django, PostgreSQL, AWS solutions etc. I

frontmatter.title: Easy and effective way of writing down your expenses
